title: White Dragon

fields.name: Abiltiies:
fields.value:
- Frost Breath: Drain up to two uses from a player's limited-use abilities at random. If they run out of all uses from this, or had no limited uses left already, roleblock them.
- Frost Shape: Grant yourself basic defense tonight. If you get attacked, the attacker will be hit by a basic attack. (1 use)
- Biting Cold â€” Choose a player who has been previously roleblocked, and hit them with an attack tier equal to the amount of living players who have been previously roleblocked, up to a maximum of Unstoppable. This can only be used once per game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock Immunity
- You cannot use Frost Shape two nights in a row.
- Whenever three or more different players are roleblocked by anything in a single night, you will gain a use for Frost Shape.
